title: Error proposing block - Cannot get tree for index

labels.name: prio-critical
labels.description: Drop everything to resolve this immediately. Examples: consensus bug, un-usable CLI

body:
<!--NOTE: -->
<!--- General questions should go to the discord chat instead of the issue tracker.-->

**Describe the bug**

One of our beacon nodes has been encountering this error for some hours

```
Feb-06 07:07:11.526 [ETH1]            error: Error updating eth1 chain cache code=ETH1_ERROR_DUPLICATE_DISTINCT_LOG, newIndex=292236, prevIndex=293927
Error: ETH1_ERROR_DUPLICATE_DISTINCT_LOG
    at Eth1DepositsCache.add (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/eth1/eth1DepositsCache.ts:45:15)
    at Eth1DepositDataTracker.updateDepositCache (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/eth1/eth1DepositDataTracker.ts:163:5)
    at Eth1DepositDataTracker.update (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/eth1/eth1DepositDataTracker.ts:144:33)
    at Eth1DepositDataTracker.runAutoUpdate (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/eth1/eth1DepositDataTracker.ts:118:29)
Feb-06 07:07:15.243 [ETH1]            error: Error updating eth1 chain cache code=ETH1_ERROR_DUPLICATE_DISTINCT_LOG, newIndex=292236, prevIndex=293927
Error: ETH1_ERROR_DUPLICATE_DISTINCT_LOG
    at Eth1DepositsCache.add (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/eth1/eth1DepositsCache.ts:45:15)
    at Eth1DepositDataTracker.updateDepositCache (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/eth1/eth1DepositDataTracker.ts:163:5)
    at Eth1DepositDataTracker.update (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/eth1/eth1DepositDataTracker.ts:144:33)
    at Eth1DepositDataTracker.runAutoUpdate (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/eth1/eth1DepositDataTracker.ts:118:29)
```

Then when it had to propose a block it couldn't get the deposit tree due to missing deposits

```
Feb-06 05:52:11.151 [API]             error: Req req-rdg produceBlockV2 error message=Cannot get tree for index: 294009, maxIndex: 293927
Error: Cannot get tree for index: 294009, maxIndex: 293927
    at getTreeAtIndex (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/util/tree.ts:7:11)
    at getDepositsWithProofs (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/eth1/utils/deposits.ts:45:44)
    at Eth1DepositsCache.get (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/eth1/eth1DepositsCache.ts:29:33)
    at getDeposits (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/eth1/utils/deposits.ts:28:20)
    at Eth1DepositDataTracker.getDeposits (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/eth1/eth1DepositDataTracker.ts:104:12)
    at Eth1DepositDataTracker.getEth1DataAndDeposits (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/eth1/eth1DepositDataTracker.ts:77:22)
    at assembleBody (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/chain/factory/block/body.ts:64:32)
    at assembleBlock (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/chain/factory/block/index.ts:44:11)
    at Object.produceBlock (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar/src/api/impl/validator/index.ts:182:21)
    at Object.handler (/usr/app/node_modules/@chainsafe/lodestar-api/src/server/utils/server.ts:70:23)
Feb-06 05:52:11.157 [API]             debug: Res req-rdg produceBlockV2 - 500
```

**Expected behavior**

- Not get dead locked with ETH1_ERROR_DUPLICATE_DISTINCT_LOG
- The block that was proposed after this missed one contained 0 deposits. Why did a faulty depositTree stopped a block proposal?
